title: Where is our Latero!
description: The squad is investigating the missing Latero sheriff in town

title: What is the missing thing?
description: The squad have heard rumors of an artifact apparently currently in the processing of Jezzi the Hut, and it is supposed to be shaped like a red pyramid.

title: Who are the old man?
description: There is an old man on the loose, the latest rumors have it, that he have left Tatooine, however it have not been verified, and Jezzi the Hut and the empire is very interested in this this old man

title: The Gangster Boss
description: After crashing a spaceship into the base of the angry gangster boss, the squad believes they are rid of this nuisance.

title: The Blue Captain
description: Lizzy have a bounty to hunt the blue captain from the Jezzi - But where is he, and why do Jezzi want him dead?

title: What is red?
description: The team have relased a red person from an unknown prision somewhere, followed the activation of a teleproter below homestead
